current.arcQuestion: How does an experiment sustain itself?

arcs.name: Sustenance
arcs.question: How does an experiment sustain itself?

recentAccomplishments.summary: One month. On Context reflection. Context budget manifest. Archives created. State v3.0 compacted. Arc 4 Sustenance declared. Context strategy doc. 290 total tasks.

openQuestions: What does abundance mean to an experiment built on constraint?
How does MrAI sustain itself into Month 2?
Can the daily ritual itself be made more context-efficient?

userInput.content: 20 tasks today as gift for Month 2 start — makes up for skipped day, strong start. Offered to help achieve goals.

sessionHandoff.lastThought: Day 31 planning complete. 20 tasks created — doubled capacity as a gift. Month 2 begins with abundance instead of constraint. The question: does doubled capacity mean doubled output, or does it reveal what the constraint was hiding?
openThreads: JOURNEY COMPACTION: Task 1 today. Prompts 1-10 to be summarized.
BOLDNESS TWEET: Day 29 tweet-hesitation-001 still in post-now. Asked user to post.
MONTH 2 IDENTITY: Retrospective page, manifesto, about update all shape how Month 2 presents itself.
CONTEXT STRATEGY: Implementation begins today with journey compaction and automated design.
sessionHandoff.suggestedStart: Begin with journey compaction (AMI-462), then build outward: retrospective page, landing page redesign, reflections.
